    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fearsome](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2837)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=590" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=598" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 237 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you critically hit with this weapon, the target becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1.
